phrases: I studied when I was in the other dimension.
And despite Inuyasha's complaints, I came back here.
Then how would you describe him?
But Kagome... I have been meaning to tell you.
He is no good for you.
He is spoiled and rough, right?
Say, does he know about Hojo?
Then who is he jealous about?
There is nothing between me and Koga!
Then why is he so jealous?
Because Koga said he is in love with me.
I do not feel anything for Koga...
I do not like or dislike him.
I did not have a clue...
That you are so popular outside of school.
It is all one-sided on Koga's part.
I wish someone would tell me he loves me!
I am in... love with you!
Well, I guess it is nice.
Actually, I have been asked to bear a child, too.
It HAS to be an older man who would ask such a thing!
But I think he already has someone he likes.
He goes around saying that to every young woman he meets.
How do you meet these guys, anyway?
Even this current guy seems like a delinquent.
And this Koga guy seems pretty pushy, too.
Hojo does not have a chance!
I guess you like the strong type, huh Kagome?
l just know you are going to have problems with men!
She will be unhappy in marriage!
And how is it going lately with your delinquent honey?
She must like him, after all.
But it is working out and that is good.
You studied hard, did not you?
Next time, go for a perfect score!
You DO eat when you are on the other side, do not you?
I will get a good night's sleep and go to class tomorrow again.
How did you do on your test?
You have got a lot to handle.
I wonder how everyone is doing.
You go into a daze once in a while.
When did Kagome say she is returning?
We would better go back to the village and be there to greet her!
But we have been here and there... with no success.
Without Kagome, we cannot get any leads on the Sacred Jewel.
And there was no sign of Naraku either.
If only I had a scent of him, I would get on his track immediately.
He is different from you all.
Which village will be hit next?
Someplace with lots of women and sake!
H-He... has not got a face!
Naraku and the smell of human blood!
His face has been carved out!
Every one of them... all without faces.
Are you the source of evil, specter?
Why have you done such a cruel thing?
You killed people because you want a face?
Now that I have a fine face, I want a fine sword.
Yes, it is a fine sword, all right.
Maybe I will go to that village next.
It never ceases to amaze me.
Why can only Sis go through?
so I can stock up on food for her when she returns.
You are another one of his offshoots!
Say, tell me who I am.
Inuyasha, I think he is the one behind all the killings, not Naraku.
He has the same smell as Naraku.
Are you the one who killed the bandits and stole their faces?
But they were all so ugly, I could not use them.
But now this one... nice, huh?
Did you steal that face, too?
Tell me... what is it I crave?
He does not even know who he is...
He is definitely unlike the others Naraku has borne.
So they have come face to face.
He is the most abominable creation of my flesh.
You attacked the village and set it afire, too?!
I felt if I slaughtered some people, I would remember something...
I told you, I cannot recall.
It is not bad, is it?
It is the name of the bonze who gave me this face.
And I do not like YOU!
I really do not like your face.
Tell me, have we met before?
It is no use talking to you!
Someone who smells exactly like Naraku is killing people senselessly!
What is his body made of?!
Like it is clay or something.
He is absorbing the Poison Insects into his body!
So what is in that village?
maybe THIS time, I will remember something.
He is made from Naraku, after all.
He is an offshoot of Naraku.
Do not just stand there in a daze!
He was made from Naraku's flesh...
Yet he claims he never heard of Naraku!
Kagura tells Inuyasha and the others of Muso's whereabouts.
It is the cave where fifty years ago, Kikyo tended to the bandit Onigumo.
But we should find out something if we go!
And during that time, Naraku sets out to destroy Kikyo!
Next on Inuyasha: Onigumo's Memory Restored!
I am going to get revenge for what happened fifty years ago!
